entry.lex: Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures distributed Big Hero 6, a film starring Scott Adsit in which Baymax first appeared.
The first appearance in a film for the character Baymax was Big Hero 6, distributed by Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures, the film starred Scott Adsit.
Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures is the distributor of the film, Big Hero 6 starring Scott Adsit and in which Baymax made his first film appearance.
The film, Big hero 6 which includes the character of Baymax, stars Scott Adsit and is distributed by Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures.
The film, Big Hero 6 stars Scott Adsit and includes the character Baymax. It was distributed by Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures.
Big Hero 6 is distributed by Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures and starts Scott Adsit and has a character called Baymax.
